pull_request.title: Add doxygen as a dependency in the README

pullrequest.title: Add doxygen as a dependency in the README

content.raw:
This worked for me:

~~~
docker run -ti ubuntu:xenial /bin/bash
apt update
apt install mercurial build-essential cmake -y
hg clone http://bitbucket.org/ignitionrobotics/ign-math
cd ign-math
mkdir build
cd build
cmake ..
make -j8 install
~~~
content.html:
This worked for me:

docker run -ti ubuntu:xenial /bin/bash
apt update
apt install mercurial build-essential cmake -y
hg clone http://bitbucket.org/ignitionrobotics/ign-math
cd ign-math
mkdir build
cd build
cmake ..
make -j8 install
